resources.string: Number of Each Color Selected by User
Number of Each Color Selected by Computer
Number of Each Color Correctly Selected

This app is heavily inspired by the ESP Trainer that was developed under a NASA program by Russell Targ at Stanford Research Institute.


OVERVIEW

 The player is presented with four colored squares. For each trial, one has been selected at random by the ESP Trainer. Your task is to choose the correct square, or pass. You can pass an indefinite number of times with no penalty. If you succeed, you will hear a sound, feel a vibration, and see a large color picture. Otherwise, the system flashes the correct square, and you proceed with the next trial.


The Score indicator counts the number of correct choices. Words of encouragement appear as you achieve the scoring levels of 6, 8, 10, 12, and 14. After 24 color selections you will see metrics about the session. These metrics will be recorded, unless you select the Guest switch in the bottom right corner of the screen.


The History view shows you all of your recorded Sessions. Selecting a Session displays that Session's Results, just like when you completed it. The Metrics view shows your stats for the lifetime of your use of the app.


TRAINING

 This trainer offers multi-sensory feedback, reinforcement, and an opportunity to Pass, meeting all the requirements needed for learning this skill. Training improves your ability to recognize your intuitive impressions, and it can bring you to a level of intuitive awareness beyond anything you have experienced before.


The purpose of the trainer is to allow you to become aware of what it feels like when you psychically choose the correct square. When you don't have that special feeling, we encourage you to press the Pass button.


We have found that people are able to improve their score by using a machine just like this to get in touch with the part of themselves that is psychic. This is often called clairvoyance or precognition, and can enhance your life in many surprising ways.


In a year long NASA program with 145 subjects (under Contract 953653 NAS7â€“100) many were able to significantly improve their scores. Four of the subjects improved their scores at the hundred-to-one level or better. This approach has been used with great success on Wall Street.


This game can provide the first steps toward experiencing and developing the psychic abilities hidden within us all.


MORE

 For more information about Extra Sensory Perception, read The Reality of ESP: A Physicist's Proof of Psychic Abilities by Russell Targ.


"I am convinced that most people can learn to move from their ordinary mind to one not obstructed by conventional barriers of space and time. Who would not want to try that?" -Russell Targ
